//kien Long tap on the map to mark a location. Choose function add pothole to add a new pothole on the map. Fill in all the information of the pothole including Label, Size, Depth, Diameter. Choose navigation function to get to the location on the map. If there are potholes along the way, they will appear on the map whether you choose to show potholes or not. For example. Cancel navigation button. Tracking Button. It will always track the user while moving. Enter pothole diagnosis mode on the journey. It will show a dialog box when there is any pothole. //thu or continue with Enter Password
 Set Password Before you can continue, please set a password for your account. ADD A NEW POTHOLE Label Big Normal Small Depth Diameter Cancel Confirm Marked a location IS THIS A POTHOLE? Potholes Master App Overview. Potholes Master is a mobile application designed for Android devices that allows users to manually or automatically detect and mark potholes based on the phone's vibration sensor. The app uses the phone's accelerometer to detect irregular movements caused by potholes, providing a solution for identifying and reporting road damage in real-time. Users can also manually mark potholes by tapping on the map within the app. This application was developed by a team of students from the NT118.P11 Mobile Application Development class, focusing on enhancing road safety and improving the accuracy of road maintenance data collection. With Potholes Master, users can contribute to better infrastructure management by identifying and documenting potholes, helping local authorities prioritize repairs and improve road conditions. Potholes Days Pothole Report Languages English Vietnamese Notification Action-base Notifications Mode On Off Vibration Silent Edit Profile Name Username Birthday Sex Male Female Other Address Bio Email Save ACCOUNT RECOVERY WIZARD Enter your email. An OTP will be sent to your email if it is registered. Reset Password Skip Profile Questions and Answers How does the app detect potholes on the road? The app uses the smartphone's accelerometer sensor to detect unusual movements while the user is driving. When the app detects irregular movements, similar to driving over a pothole, it records the location and notifies the user of the event. In what road conditions can the app detect potholes? The app can detect potholes on most types of rough roads. However, the accuracy may be affected by factors such as driving speed, the shape of the pothole, and other obstacles on the road. How does the app record the location of the pothole? " The app uses the phone's GPS to record the exact location of a pothole when it is detected. Every time a pothole is detected, the app automatically saves the coordinates and timestamp so users can review the data on a map." Can I manually report a pothole? Yes, you can manually report a pothole by tapping on the map to mark its location. This helps the community of users contribute additional data and supports more accurate pothole detection. Does the app store my data? The app will store data about detected potholes, including their location and time, on your phone. You can view this data anytime in the app’s history section. This data can be used for analysis and helps local authorities improve infrastructure. Enter a 6-digit OTP Verify OTP Resend OTP Log Out Password Remember Me Forgot your Password?
